name: Brazilian Exotic Wave
description:
Our Brazilian Exotic Wave is a soft & silky wave base in texture. Its natural wave pattern is beautiful. Hair can be straightened for a more bone straight look, hair can also be curled and styled. For maintanance of curls, flexi rods can be used.

About Hair:
Virgin Brazilian Hair is the finest quality Brazilian Human hair available. All Virgin Brazilian Hair has undergone a stringent quality assurance to ensure it is free of imperfections. Each bundle of Virgin Brazilian Hair is 4 ounces and available in a Natural Black/Brown color. With proper care, hair lasts 6 months - 1 year +.

How Many Bundles Are Required For A Full Head?
16" OR Shorter = 8oz [ 2 Bundles ]
18"-26" = 12oz [ 3 Bundles ]
28" and Longer = 16oz [ 4 Bundles ]

Lengths: 14" - 32"

SHIPPING: 2-5 Business Days (Holidays and Weekends Excluded)

name: Brazilian Curly
description:

Hair can be straightened curled & styled, then back to its natural state. PS: Excessive heat applied to the hair, can reduce the curl pattern to re-appear.

name: Brazilian Body Wave Lace Closure
description:
La Bella lace closures blend effortlessly with our hair extensions finishing off your style with a virtually undetectable weave. Our closures are attached individually to the lace base and allows for versatile parting. Like all of our virgin hair, this gorgeous authentic hair has not been mixed with synthetic hair fibers or hair from different origins. Hair is double drawn with cuticles intact to prevent tangling and shedding problems 


Hair Texture: Virgin Brazilian Body Wave

Lace Material: Swiss lace, Strong & Invisible

Lace Size: 4*4''

Length: 10''-20''

Color: Natural Brown/Black

SHIPPING: 2-5 Days ( Not Including Holidays or Weekends )

name: Ombré Services
description:
Ombré Hair Technique is The Fading of Darker Roots into The Middle of Hair and Gradually Gets Lighter From The Middle of The Hair to The End.

We Can Ombre Hair to Any Color of Customers Choice

- Refer to The Color Chart for Color Choices !

name: Color Chart
description:
Some Bundles may vary in that some may be lighter or darker than others. We carry 100% VIRGIN HAIR. We have no way of controlling the donor's hair color. If you request a specific hair color, hair can be dyed with no damage to hair. ** Please note that once hair is dyed, it becomes PROCESSED, hence losing its Virginity :)

Thanks For Your Business.

name: Hair Care
description:
How To Care For Your La Bella's Hair ?

Washing Instructions
1. Brush out ALL knots (brush from the bottom up)
- Do NOT brush downwards (counter productive)

2. Wash with warm water as this opens up the cuticles of the hair.
* Use sulfate free products * Objective is to MOISTURIZE not dry hair!
Do NOT rub the hair while washing as it will damage the hair and cause it to tangle.

3. With conditioning, run your fingers through the hair from top to bottom
Do NOT rub the hair while conditioning as it will damage the hair ad cause it to tangle.
(Use a wide tooth comb, which will help the conditioner spread evenly through the hair)
- Do NOT comb from top down. Comb from the bottom up!
Rinse thoroughly to rid of all conditioner

4. Gently pat dry hair. Apply a dab of Leave-in Conditioner, scrunching the end in the fist of your palm, this helps eliminate split ends. Comb leave in conditioner in and proceed to air dry.

Once dry you'll feel the difference. Hair will be vibrant and full of body

- " The more you take care of your hair, the better you will be protecting your investment "
